profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
LONI Aluminum & Contracting has established itself as one of Ontarioâ€™s leading Siding, Soffit & Fascia, Windows and Doors installation, and replacement companies. We have serviced homeowners for over 20 years and we continue to provide innovative home improvement products that exceed industry standards for quality, reliability, and performance.
 
 We use highly specialized installation techniques to ensure a lifetime of satisfaction from our customers. We always strive to go beyond our customerâ€™s requirements for beautiful, strong and thermally efficient products.
 
Quality, commitment, and the promise of product longevity are the core philosophies of LONI Aluminum & Contracting. All of our installations are warranted for life, if any sort of failure does occur we will fix or replace the defect, free of charge for as long as you own the home.
 
We carry a $2,000,000 Liability insurance to make sure safety is our top priority. All of our workers are covered by WSIB workers compensation. If we get hurt on your property, youâ€™re not liable in any way. Copies supplied upon request.
 
When you call LONI Aluminum & Contracting, you will be greeted with a courteous, knowledgeable staff member who will be happy to assist you in any capacity. If an appointment is set we will email you a confirmation with the time and date. One of our very experienced representatives will arrive ON TIME and give you a no pressure demonstration specific to the product your interested in. Theyâ€™ll then leave you with a price which is good for 30 days.
 
LONI Aluminum & Contracting covers the entire Greater Toronto area and some parts of Northern and Southern Ontario. If you decide to move forward with us, weâ€™ll write a detailed agreement including all the specifications we discussed. Most projects are completed within 3 to 4 weeks of the agreement. We wonâ€™t accept final payment until you are 100% satisfied.
 
Call us at 905-463-1803 for a free quote today! For out of office hours, we can be reached at 647-833-7665 (call or text).
 
 
Check us out on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/lonialuminum/

profile:
The home is - for most of us - the single most important investment and asset that we will own in our lifetimes.  Period.
It's where we live, where we raise our families, and it's where we build our wealth.  At McLaren Custom Homes we understand this.  Your home and -  more importantly - your plans for it, are important to us.  But let's face it, re-models can be overwhelming!!  Its hard to know where to start, who to talk to, who to trust!  Let us help make things EASY for you.  McLaren Custom Homes main goal is to make the whole renovation process an enjoyable experience.  We treat your home and project as if it were our own, because if it was our home we would want the best.   

  Our diverse team specializes in the following:
- Project Design
- Building Permit Application Packages
- New Building and Additions
- Full or Partial Renovations
- Kitchen Re-models
- Exterior Spaces
- General contracting

All of us at McLaren Custom Homes strive to deliver high-quality, cost-effective projects on schedule by employing and supporting motivated, flexible, and focused teams. We are able to orchestrate your project from start to finish using our extended crew of trustworthy and professional trades while staying on time and on budget.  We value the importance of our relationships and will continue to remain fair and true in our dealings with all employees, clients, vendors, and partners. Our clients count on our dependability, our drive, and our integrity we take so much pride in our projects end results.    
 
We cannot wait to hear from you!  Please give us a call to see if McLaren Custom Homes would be good fit for your next renovation project.

profile:
Custom Development Group is a full-service building and construction company located in Mississauga, ON servicing the greater Toronto area with an accumulative 35+ years of experience. We pride ourselves on going over and above the standard code and build to a higher quality.

Our team of experts will help you understand your options and help guide you through every phase of the project. We will walk you through exactly what is involved in the renovation/build process and help you make the right choices for your style, design, and budget to get the true custom experience.

Our services include custom design builds, additions, as well as significant renovations in both residential and commercial spaces.

profile:
"My Prestigious Home" is where you need to be...

MPH has been a leader in major renovations and custom home construction since 2007. From concept to completion, we take a clientâ€™s vision and make it a reality through a comprehensive process to ensure the finished product exceeds expectations. Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your project and better to say, your investment. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, MPH is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.

Our vast professional experience, skilled expertise and attention to details enable us to offer you innovative solutions, competitive pricing and the ability to meet milestones. We appreciate how much your project means to you. Thatâ€™s why we approach each project with professionalism, integrity and adaptability while maintaining open communication with you every step of the way.
We pride ourselves in Home additions, renovations, custom home building, commercial renovations, condominium renovations and design and build projects.

We understand custom homes and renovations are amongst the most important investment to people in their lifetime. So whether it be a new architecturally designed or inspired home, or a renovation and extension of your existing home, you can be guaranteed that MPH is most definitely the qualified team for your project.

We have had the opportunity to transform your dreams into reality by designing rooms where you can relax and your children can safely play. We have enjoyed being a part of homeownersâ€™ lives and strive to continue to provide our customers with the best technology on the market. We have completed literally hundreds of renovations since our inception. 

Please view our website at http://MyPrestigiousHome.com to view images of some of our projects.

Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.

Our projects range from building new custom homes, home additions and extensions, condominium renovations, architectural design and permit, structural engineering, commercial renovations, rear addition, second floor addition, basement underpinning, custom kitchen and bathrooms, residential renovations and finally we design and build everything. We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship.

With 2 year Warranty, we at MPH know how to design and build lasting results and lasting relationships with each of our highly respected clients.

Our focus is on Custom projects such as custom Kitchen renovations, Basement Finishing and underpinning, Bathroom Renovation and Bathroom Remodeling, Home Additions, Second Story Additions, Rear Additions, Home Extensions and Rear Extensions, commercial renovations, office renovation, architectural drawings, permit and etc. We work with some of the top architects, interior designers, engineers and sub-trades in Toronto. We are the all inclusive General Contractor who will take care of all your design and general contracting needs.

MPH is an innovative, full service design/build/construction firm based in Toronto, specializing in residential clients across the GTA. With decades of construction management experience on a wide variety of residential projects, we offer a strong design aesthetic, invaluable insight, vast resources and craftsman that exceed client expectations.

Strong leadership and communication skills are the essential components necessary to navigate a construction project from concept to completion. Our extensive knowledge of all trade areas involved in both new construction and sophisticated renovations have proven invaluable to our company and our clients. Our recognition of the importance of scheduling, cost control, and quality control underlies and defines our successful completion of many challenging projects on time and within budget.

There are many different reasons to work with us: to make room for a growing family, to improve layout or increase the resale value of your property! Our team of professionals offer customers design and build counselling along with skilled trades and top discounts, on top brands.

There is no substitute for experience. Join the list of satisfied clients! In the end the quality of your project depends on who you hire. When you hire us, you do so because of our companyâ€™s reputation, our track record with past clients and our commitment to new ones.

Contact us for a free "No Pressure" estimate and let us help you take the first step to completing your project. Advice is always free. Remember, we are talking about Professional Advice from Skilled Engineer.
